job.name: NewTest
job.command:
source /afs/rhic.bnl.gov/star/packages/.DEV2/setupDEV2.csh set Name = `basename ${SUBMITTINGDIRECTORY}` echo $Name | egrep -i '(debug|dbg)' if (! $?) then if ($?NODEBUG) unsetenv NODEBUG else setenv NODEBUG yes endif echo $Name | egrep -i 'x8664' if (! $?) then setenv USE_64BITS 1 else setenv USE_64BITS 0 endif #starver TFG20c #starver .DEV2 starver TFG20g setenv STARFPE NO #set controlFile = /star/u/starreco/newtest/sampleList_nonopt.txt set controlFile = $STAR/StRoot/StBFChain/sampleList.txt set nevents = `grep -A5 job${JOBINDEX} ${controlFile} | grep -e " *nevents" | head -1 | sed 's| *nevents *= *\([0-9]*\) *$|\1|'` set chain = `grep -A5 job${JOBINDEX} ${controlFile} | grep -e " *chain" | head -1 | sed 's| *chain *= *\(.*\) *$|\1|'` set out_dir = ${SUBMITTINGDIRECTORY}/`grep -A5 job${JOBINDEX} ${controlFile} | grep -e " *out_dir" | head -1 | sed 's| *out_dir *= *\(.*\) *$|\1|'`
set inputfile = `grep -A5 job${JOBINDEX} ${controlFile} | grep -e " *inputfile" | head -1 | sed 's| *inputfile *= *\(.*\) *$|\1|'` set logFile = `echo $inputfile | sed 's|.*/\([A-Za-z_0-9.]*\).[df][az][qd]|\1.log|'`
set infile0 = `echo $inputfile | sed 's|.*/\([A-Za-z_0-9.]*\)|\1|'`
echo "chain --> "${chain} echo "out_dir --> "${out_dir} echo "inputfile --> "${inputfile} echo "logFile --> "${logFile} echo "nevents --> "${nevents} echo "infile0 --> "${infile0}
#rm ${out_dir}/*.root #rm ${out_dir}/*.log if ( -r ${out_dir}/${logFile}) exit 0; if (! -d ${out_dir}) mkdir -p ${out_dir} #cd $SCRATCH cd ${out_dir} #starver SL19c
echo $STAR
#setenv DB_SERVER_LOCAL_CONFIG /afs/rhic.bnl.gov/star/packages/conf/dbLoadBalancerLocalConfig_nightly.xml
setenv StarEndMakerShell
#cp ${inputfile} $SCRATCH #grep sse /proc/cpuinfo | sort -u | tee ${logFile} #echo $SCRATCH/${infile0} echo ${inputfile} | grep fzd if (! $?) then root4star -b -q bfc.C\($nevents,\"${chain}\",\"${inputfile}\"\) >& ${logFile} else root.exe -b -q bfc.C\($nevents,\"${chain}\",\"${inputfile}\"\) >& ${logFile} endif #cp ${logFile} ${out_dir} # #foreach OUTPUT_FILE (*.root) # #echo ${OUTPUT_FILE} # #cp $SCRATCH/${OUTPUT_FILE} ${out_dir} # #end
